name: New Sport! Extra Game Jam 2018
description:
A team of 3 (4ish) created this masterpiece over a weekend during Extra Credits Game Jam 2018!

It's a two player action sport with robots and bombs. Each player has to defend their side before the other player destroys everything! Run, jump, and throw bombs to achieve victory.

PS. If you die holding the ball, it will be gone forever!

Requirements: 2 USB Controllers
